title: The TVLine-Up: What’s Returning, New and Leaving the Week of Jan. 12
description: This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch column, our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming, and our master list of Every New TV Show Premiering in 2025. With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
excerpt: TVLine's weekly roundup of the week's premieres and finales includes returning favorites 'Severance,' 'Law & Order: SVU' and 'XO, Kitty.'
text: This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch column, our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming, and our master list of Every New TV Show Premiering in 2025. With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or that the new “prestige drama” you anticipated is about to debut. So consider this our reminder to set your DVR, order a Season Pass, pop a fresh Memorex into the VCR… however it is you roll. This week, you’ll find 19 returning favorites (including All Creatures Great and Small, Severance and XO, Kitty), six series debuts (including Sam Heughan in The Couple Next Door) and six finales (including Landman, Silo and Star Wars: Skeleton Crew). SUNDAY, JAN. 123 am Landman Season 1 finale (Paramount+)8 pm Miss Scarlet Season 5 premiere (PBS)9 pm All Creatures Great and Small Season 5 premiere (PBS)9 pm Rogue Heroes Season 2 premiere (MGM+) TUESDAY, JAN. 143 am Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy documentary premiere (Peacock)3 am FBI: True Season 6 premiere (Paramount+; all 12 episodes)8 pm St. Denis Medical returns (NBC)8:30 pm Night Court returns (NBC)9 pm Hard Knocks In Season Season 4 finale (HBO)9 pm Star Wars: Skeleton Crew Season 1 finale (Disney+) WEDNESDAY, JAN. 153 am Love Island All Stars Season 2 premiere (Peacock)3 am A Real Bug’s Life Season 2 premiere (Disney+; all five episodes)3 am With Love, Meghan series premiere (Netflix; all eight episodes)9 pm American Pickers Season 26 finale (History)9 pm An Update On Our Family docuseries premiere (HBO)10 pm Scam Goddess series premiere (Freeform) THURSDAY, JAN. 163 am Harley Quinn Season 5 premiere (Max)3 am A Real Pain streaming premiere (Hulu)3 am Sesame Street Season 55 premiere (Max)3 am SNL50: Beyond Saturday Night docuseries premiere (Peacock; all four episodes)3 am Unstoppable movie premiere (Prime Video)3 am XO, Kitty Season 2 premiere (Netflix; all eight episodes)8 pm Hollywood Squares reboot premiere (CBS)8 pm Law & Order returns (NBC)9 pm Law & Order: SVU returns (NBC)10 pm Found returns (NBC) FRIDAY, JAN. 173 am Back in Action movie premiere (Netflix)3 am A Different Man streaming premiere (Max)3 am Henry Danger: The Movie premiere (Paramount+)3 am Roy Wood Jr.: Lonely Flowers comedy special (Hulu)3 am Severance Season 2 premiere (Apple TV+)3 am Silo Season 2 finale (Apple TV+)8 pm Outlander Season 7 finale (Starz)8 pm Shark Tank returns (ABC)9:05 pm The Couple Next Door series premiere (Starz)10 pm NFL Icons Season 4 premiere (MGM+)10 pm Real Time With Bill Maher Season 23 premiere (HBO) SATURDAY, JAN. 1811:30 pm Saturday Night Live returns (NBC) Want scoop on any of the above shows? Email InsideLine@tvline.com and your question may be answered via Matt’s Inside Line. January Streaming Guide: 80+ Premieres!
html:
This weekly feature is in addition to TVLine’s daily What to Watch column, our monthly breakdown of What’s on Streaming, and our master list of Every New TV Show Premiering in 2025.

With over 500 scripted shows now airing across broadcast, cable and streaming, it’s easy to forget that a favorite comedy is returning, or that the new “prestige drama” you anticipated is about to debut. So consider this our reminder to set your DVR, order a Season Pass, pop a fresh Memorex into the VCR… however it is you roll.

This week, you’ll find 19 returning favorites (including All Creatures Great and Small, Severance and XO, Kitty), six series debuts (including Sam Heughan in The Couple Next Door) and six finales (including Landman, Silo and Star Wars: Skeleton Crew).

SUNDAY, JAN. 12
3 am Landman Season 1 finale (Paramount+)
8 pm Miss Scarlet Season 5 premiere (PBS)
9 pm All Creatures Great and Small Season 5 premiere (PBS)
9 pm Rogue Heroes Season 2 premiere (MGM+)

TUESDAY, JAN. 14
3 am Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy documentary premiere (Peacock)
3 am FBI: True Season 6 premiere (Paramount+; all 12 episodes)
8 pm St. Denis Medical returns (NBC)
8:30 pm Night Court returns (NBC)
9 pm Hard Knocks In Season Season 4 finale (HBO)
9 pm Star Wars: Skeleton Crew Season 1 finale (Disney+)

WEDNESDAY, JAN. 15
3 am Love Island All Stars Season 2 premiere (Peacock)
3 am A Real Bug’s Life Season 2 premiere (Disney+; all five episodes)
3 am With Love, Meghan series premiere (Netflix; all eight episodes)
9 pm American Pickers Season 26 finale (History)
9 pm An Update On Our Family docuseries premiere (HBO)
10 pm Scam Goddess series premiere (Freeform)

THURSDAY, JAN. 16
3 am Harley Quinn Season 5 premiere (Max)
3 am A Real Pain streaming premiere (Hulu)
3 am Sesame Street Season 55 premiere (Max)
3 am SNL50: Beyond Saturday Night docuseries premiere (Peacock; all four episodes)
3 am Unstoppable movie premiere (Prime Video)
3 am XO, Kitty Season 2 premiere (Netflix; all eight episodes)
8 pm Hollywood Squares reboot premiere (CBS)
8 pm Law & Order returns (NBC)
9 pm Law & Order: SVU returns (NBC)
10 pm Found returns (NBC)

FRIDAY, JAN. 17
3 am Back in Action movie premiere (Netflix)
3 am A Different Man streaming premiere (Max)
3 am Henry Danger: The Movie premiere (Paramount+)
3 am Roy Wood Jr.: Lonely Flowers comedy special (Hulu)
3 am Severance Season 2 premiere (Apple TV+)
3 am Silo Season 2 finale (Apple TV+)
8 pm Outlander Season 7 finale (Starz)
8 pm Shark Tank returns (ABC)
9:05 pm The Couple Next Door series premiere (Starz)
10 pm NFL Icons Season 4 premiere (MGM+)
10 pm Real Time With Bill Maher Season 23 premiere (HBO)

SATURDAY, JAN. 18
11:30 pm Saturday Night Live returns (NBC)

Want scoop on any of the above shows? Email InsideLine@tvline.com and your question may be answered via Matt’s Inside Line.

January Streaming Guide: 80+ Premieres!
